product_name: DeFeet Cyclismo Hi-Vis Bike Socks - Men's
long_description: A winner during historic Giro d'Italia stages of yore, the men's DeFeet Cyclismo Hi-Vis Bike Socks have broken records, updated their color, and now are gunning for the top spot in your sock lineup. High-visibility coloring adds to the fun; the seamless feel, beautiful lines and intricate patterns of the Cyclismo add to the fame. Aireator(R) mesh in the weave enhances ventiliation to keep your feet cool; mesh cuff also breathes well. Fabric pulls moisture away from the skin for a dry feel while you ride. Consistent pressure from the entire sock supports the foot and feels great. Cyclismo Hi-Vis Bike Socks feature DeFeet's ultra-clean toe seam that is undetectable and built to last.
short_description: A winner during historic Giro d'Italia stages of yore, the men's DeFeet Cyclismo Hi-Vis Bike Socks have broken records, updated their color, and now are gunning for the top spot in your sock lineup.
